title: Practical Competency Enhancement Program Based on Marine Simulators

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ship navigation theory and understanding of maritime safety regulations
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating decision-making and crisis-response capabilities in real marine environments for administrative/management professionals

learning_goals: Perform ship maneuvering and emergency response procedures in a simulator functionally equivalent to the actual marine environment with 90% accuracy
Improve crisis management efficiency by 30% through role distribution and communication in team-based collaborative scenarios
Develop preventive strategies based on marine accident case analyses and acquire the ability to prepare risk assessment reports
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
